#summary Status of Hotwire distributions

= Status of Hotwire on Unix/Linux systems =

 * Archlinux: The [http://aur.archlinux.org/packages.php?do_Details=1&ID=12103 package] lives in AUR, so you can `makepkg` it or just use Yaourt to install it.
 * Gentoo: [http://bugs.gentoo.org/show_bug.cgi?id=183519 ebuild bug] (someone please pick this up), see also [http://forums.gentoo.org/viewtopic-p-4517681.html?sid=35ecace13a7eb1d78eba6d94b098707a forum thread on sqlite3]
 * Other? If you've packaged Hotwire for another system (or need help doing so) let us know on the [http://groups.google.com/group/hotwire-shell discussion group]
